questions.question: True or false: The list of seven wonders is based on ancient Greek guidebooks for tourists.

imageMetadata.resources: Photo by Dariusz Sankowski on Unsplash /CCO

questions.resources: Photo by Dariusz Sankowski on Unsplash /CCO

questions.question: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the wonders. What was its purpose?

choices.answer: A monument to the god Ra
A momument to a great war victory

questions.question: Why were the Hanging Gardens of Babylon  supposedly built?

choices.answer: A monument to Ninurta, the god of farmers
An engagement gift from a king to his future queen
A gift for the king's wife

questions.question: The second Temple of Artemis was burnt down by Herostratus. Why did he set the temple on fire?

choices.answer: He was angry at the gods
